channel.title: PROBLEM WITH THE SERVER ! Smartguys , help me out please ;/
channel.description:
hey , i got an problem . I can run my server . Everything will work . And then BOOM , server goes down ,
And when pple try to log in then it says U r already logged in ;
Heres the picture about it
[IMG]http://i30.tinypic.com/z8shz.jpg[/img]
Please help me out :(

item.title: PROBLEM WITH THE SERVER ! Smartguys , help me out please ;/

Thank u MusicMad . Ur the best

item.title: PROBLEM WITH THE SERVER ! Smartguys , help me out please ;/
item.dc:creator: @musicmad441 Musicmad
item.description:
@musicmad441 wrote:

Easy fix, right click your runserver.bat, then replace the text with this:

@echo off color 00c title Running Server Please Wait... @echo ---------------------------------------- @echo ---Running Server... Please Wait...--- @echo ---------------------------------------- java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server @echo ------------------------------------------ @echo --Server Has run Been Compiled!-- @echo ------------------------------------------ pause

This will increase the memory allowance on your ram.

Deal fixed.

Good luck,

Musicmad

Read full topic
